name: Bo-Bit
description:
little game i made in 2019

if you like simple puzzle games with cozy aesthetics, you might like this

controls (keyboard):
Arrow Keys / WASD - Move
Space - continue
R - retry a level
L - go to level selection screen
Esc - exit game
Alt+Enter - full screen

Soundtrack:
https://soundcloud.com/trayson/sets/bo-bit-ost
